metas.name: The Americans
metas.description: Given your enjoyment of intricate plots and moral ambiguity in 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS', this Cold War-era spy drama about Soviet sleeper agents living as an American family will deeply engage you with its constant tension, complex characters, and high stakes.

metas.name: Chernobyl
metas.description: Your appreciation for prestige dramas and intense, dark themes as seen in 'Foundation' will resonate with the unflinching and masterfully crafted depiction of the Chernobyl disaster. It's a harrowing, intelligent, and historically significant series.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: If you're drawn to psychological depth and gritty crime investigations like in 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS', this series exploring the early days of criminal profiling and serial killer psychology offers a deeply unsettling and fascinating dive into the criminal mind.

metas.name: Peaky Blinders
metas.description: The blend of crime, drama, and intense character arcs you enjoyed in 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS' is present here in spades. This series follows a notorious gang in post-WWI Birmingham, offering grit, style, and compelling moral quandaries.

metas.name: The Sopranos
metas.description: As a connoisseur of prestige television with dark themes and emotional complexity, you will find 'The Sopranos' to be a monumental achievement. Its exploration of a mob boss's life, family, and psychological turmoil is unparalleled.

metas.name: Breaking Bad
metas.description: Your liking for intense, high-stakes narratives evident in 'The Night Manager' makes 'Breaking Bad' a must-watch. This series meticulously charts a chemistry teacher's descent into the criminal underworld, marked by exceptional writing and acting.

metas.name: Better Call Saul
metas.description: If you appreciated the character development and intricate plotting in 'Breaking Bad' (or shows like it), this prequel offers a similarly rich, character-driven exploration of legal and moral compromise, culminating in a deeply satisfying narrative arc.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: The psychological complexity and mystery you enjoyed in 'Stranger Things' and 'Love, Death & Robots' will be amplified by this show. It's a dark, intricate thriller about a cybersecurity engineer with social anxiety who gets involved with an anarchist hacker group.

metas.name: Westworld
metas.description: Your enjoyment of sci-fi with complex themes, as seen in 'Foundation' and 'Love, Death & Robots', makes this a prime candidate. It explores artificial intelligence, consciousness, and morality in a futuristic theme park.

metas.name: The Leftovers
metas.description: For a show that delves deeply into emotional complexity and has dark, thought-provoking themes, this is a masterclass. It follows the survivors of a global event where 2% of the population vanished.

metas.name: True Detective
metas.description: Given your taste for gritty crime and psychological mysteries like 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS', the anthology format of 'True Detective' offers different, equally intense explorations of dark cases and troubled detectives.

metas.name: Ozark
metas.description: The high stakes, dark themes, and criminal element present in 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS' are central to 'Ozark'. It's a story of a financial planner who must launder money for a drug cartel.

metas.name: The Wire
metas.description: If you appreciate realism, complex narratives, and dark, unflinching portrayals of societal issues similar to what you might find compelling in 'HIS & HERS', 'The Wire' is considered one of the greatest crime dramas ever made.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Your liking for 'Love, Death & Robots' and its exploration of darker sci-fi themes suggests you'll appreciate this anthology series that examines the dark side of technology and its impact on society.

metas.name: The Crown
metas.description: While more historical drama, 'The Crown' offers prestige storytelling with immense emotional complexity and high stakes related to duty and power, fitting your appreciation for quality and depth seen in 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: This anthology series blends dark humor, crime, and intense psychological drama, echoing the tone of 'Succession' and the crime elements of 'HIS & HERS'. It's consistently acclaimed for its writing and performances.

metas.name: Mare of Easttown
metas.description: Your preference for gritty crime and mystery, as seen in 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS', will be satisfied by this compelling series. It features a detective investigating a local murder while her own life unravels.

metas.name: Sharp Objects
metas.description: This psychological thriller delves into dark family secrets and trauma, aligning with your interest in complex emotional narratives and mysteries, much like elements in 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Gangs of London
metas.description: If you enjoyed the intense crime drama and high stakes of 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS', this series offers a brutal and sprawling look at the power struggles within London's criminal underworld.

metas.name: Raised by Wolves
metas.description: Your enjoyment of sci-fi and fantasy with complex themes, as seen in 'Foundation' and 'Love, Death & Robots', makes this Ridley Scott-produced series about androids raising human children on a mysterious planet a strong contender.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: This show masterfully blends psychological mystery, dark themes, and high-concept sci-fi, fitting your interest in shows that demand attention and challenge the viewer, similar to 'Mr. Robot' and 'Westworld'.

metas.name: Yellowjackets
metas.description: Combining survival horror, psychological drama, and mystery, this series about a high school girls' soccer team stranded in the wilderness and their future selves grappling with the aftermath will appeal to your taste for dark, complex narratives.

metas.name: The Killing
metas.description: If you liked the detailed crime investigations and atmospheric mystery of 'HIS & HERS' and 'All Her Fault', this dark and moody police procedural, focusing on a single murder investigation per season, will be highly engaging.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: For a darker, more cynical take on the superhero genre, this series offers intense action, dark themes, and critical social commentary that might appeal to your enjoyment of mature, challenging content like in 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Squid Game
metas.description: The extreme stakes, dark themes, and psychological tension of this survival thriller make it a perfect fit for your preference for intense, attention-demanding shows, akin to the thrills in 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Raised by Wolves
metas.description: Your enjoyment of sci-fi with complex themes, as seen in 'Foundation' and 'Love, Death & Robots', makes this Ridley Scott-produced series about androids raising human children on a mysterious planet a strong contender.

metas.name: The Fall
metas.description: This psychological thriller centers on a detective hunting a serial killer, offering the dark themes, intense cat-and-mouse dynamics, and gripping mystery you've enjoyed in 'HIS & HERS' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: If you appreciate intelligent, slow-burn thrillers with high stakes and complex characters, this spy thriller about parallel universes offers a unique and compelling narrative that will engage your desire for depth and intrigue.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: This German sci-fi thriller is a masterclass in complex storytelling, mystery, and dark themes, akin to the intricate puzzles in 'Stranger Things' and the high-concept nature of 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Alias Grace
metas.description: Based on a Margaret Atwood novel, this historical drama with mystery elements delves into the life of a convicted murderer, offering the emotional complexity and psychological intrigue you might have enjoyed in 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: This British thriller delivers high-stakes political intrigue and intense action, reminiscent of the tension found in 'The Night Manager', with a strong focus on psychological pressure and suspense.

metas.name: Halt and Catch Fire
metas.description: This series offers complex character development, high stakes within the tech industry, and emotional depth, appealing to your appreciation for prestige dramas with substance, like 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Hannibal
metas.description: For those who appreciate dark themes, psychological depth, and a sophisticated, often disturbing, approach to crime, 'Hannibal' is a visually stunning and intellectually engaging series.

metas.name: The Man in the High Castle
metas.description: Your interest in 'Foundation' suggests you enjoy ambitious sci-fi world-building with high stakes. This alternate history drama set in a world where the Axis powers won WWII is a gripping and thought-provoking watch.

metas.name: American Horror Story
metas.description: Given your enjoyment of dark themes and horror elements in 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Stranger Things', this anthology series offers a variety of intense, unsettling, and often disturbing narratives.

metas.name: The Sinner
metas.description: This crime drama anthology focuses on why ordinary people commit heinous crimes, offering the psychological mystery and dark themes you've enjoyed in series like 'HIS & HERS' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Mr. Inbetween
metas.description: A superb dark comedy and crime drama, this series offers a grounded, often darkly humorous, look at a hitman navigating his life and relationships, appealing to your appreciation for shows like 'Barry'.

metas.name: Taboo
metas.description: This period drama is intensely atmospheric, dark, and features a compelling, complex protagonist with high stakes, fitting your preference for gritty and engaging storytelling.

metas.name: Gomorrah
metas.description: If you appreciate gritty crime dramas and unflinching portrayals of criminal organizations, much like the darker aspects of 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS', this Italian series offers a hyper-realistic look at the Camorra mafia.

metas.name: Temple
metas.description: This British drama features a neurosurgeon who is forced to operate on people in a disused underground hospital to save his wife. It's a high-stakes, tense, and morally complex thriller.
